subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Pat Lucey threw for 368 yards and 3 touchdowns to lead undefeated Williams to a victory over Amherst on Saturday in what is known among these colleges as the Biggest Little Game in America.
snippet: Pat Lucey threw for 368 yards and 3 touchdowns to lead undefeated Williams to a victory over Amherst on Saturday in what is known among these colleges as the Biggest Little Game in America.
